author: roger
msg: THRIFT-1412 Thrift Transport classes should manage the lifetime of objects implementing IDisposable by implementing IDisposable themselves

author: tgraves
msg: MAPREDUCE-4107. Fix tests in org.apache.hadoop.ipc.TestSocketFactory (Devaraj K via tgraves)

author: markt
msg: POOL-131. Implement a form of logging for swallowed exceptions that makes the last 10 stack traces available via a getter and all swallowed stack traces are sent out via JMX notifications.
Added tests for JMX registration and deregistration and cleaned up a lot of tests that did not close the pool.
Enable test that were previously disabled for no obvious reason (since they currently pass).
